name: game-storev3
description: Full-stack Game Store (Express + SQLite, React + Tailwind) with integrated dev server

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf dist && cp -r frontend/dist dist && cp frontend/assites/logo.png dist/logo.png 2>/dev/null || true && cp frontend/assites/Invoice_Logo.png dist/invoice-header.png 2>/dev/null || true && cp frontend/public/icon-192x192.svg dist/icon-192x192.svg 2>/dev/null || true && cp frontend/public/icon-512x512.svg dist/icon-512x512.svg 2>/dev/null || true && cp frontend/assites/logo.png dist/icon-192x192.png 2>/dev/null || true && cp frontend/assites/logo.png dist/icon-512x512.png 2>/dev/null || true
